prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Promptbook is a project aimed at revolutionizing software development by enabling the creation of AI applications using plain human language, making it understandable and executable by both humans and machines.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, software development, AI applications, human language, understandable, executable, humans, machines
